title: Get Started
text: get REDCap turned R database… can set REDCap token two ways! need help setting tokens see article –> placeholder
code: library(REDCapSync)  projects <- get_projects()                         # get list of cached projects  View(projects)                             # show your previously saved projects #1. set each time in your session (not recommended in saved/shared scripts!) Sys.setenv(REDCapSync_TEST1 = "YoUrNevErShaReToken") #2. set to your private R sessions! usethis::edit_r_environ()                                       #finds your file # Then you add --> REDCapSync_TEST = 'YoUrNevErShaReToken' # then save file and restart R # If it worked you will see your token when you run... Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST1")

title: Get Started
text: following functions represent core functions package.
code: project <- setup_project(   project_name = "TEST1",          # must match token pattern REDCapSync_*******   redcap_uri = "https://redcap.fakei.edu/api/",         # your institutions link   dir_path = getwd()                                   # your intended file path ) project$sync() # gets all data from REDCap

title: Get Started
code: project$show_metadata(envir = globalenv()) project$generate_summary(   summary_name = "REDCapSync_raw",   envir = globalenv()   )

title: Get Started
text: following default merges non-repeating forms adds right repeating forms. also uses REDCap log REDCap data add key information metadata, users, records. can customized add_summary refreshing datasets generate_summary R-use. can give filtered data (corresponding annotations metadata, etc), de-identified data, !
code: project$generate_summary(   summary_name = "REDCapSync",   envir = globalenv() project$generate_summary(     filter_field = "has_something" # Raw REDCap variable name     filter_choices = "Yes"       # REDCap Labelled choice,     exclude_identifiers = TRUE,     exclude_free_text = TRUE,     include_metadata = TRUE,     envir = globalenv()   )

title: Tokens
text: REDCap API tokens equivalent username password. never shared anyone. Ideally, never directly written R script, especially plan sharing future. Never commit file containing token git GitHub forever history. ever doubt mind quickly regenerate token REDCap website. working real REDCap project ’s good practice regenerate token periodically, week, just safe. Precisely tokens sensitive, REDCapSync designed reference name token, “REDCapSync_TEST”. REDCapSync ever wants use token make API call REDCap, check Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST"). default token names start “REDCapSync_”, followed project_name chose setup_project().demonstrates set check tokens…

what: Setting Your Token for One Session
title: Tokens
text: can set manually base R. Unless specifically set token Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") blank. Now token set R session . restarted R, blank .
code: # Set your token manually # again having this in a script is not advised but possible Sys.setenv(REDCapSync_TEST="a_FaKe_TOkEn")   # Get your token Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") #>[1] "a_FaKe_TOkEn"

what: Setting Your Token for Any Session
title: Tokens
text: may find want reuse token, may several projects, convenient way store tokens separate location. One way personal .Renviron file. , check always confirm location file make sure ’s part cloud storage git GitHub. can use usethis::edit_r_environ() semi-permanently save token. time launch R session file run token visible specifically called Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST"). Open .Renviron file usethis::edit_r_environ() Add token like … REDCapSync_TEST = "faKeTokeN" Save file Close Restart R Session (Session tab .rs.restartR()). Confirm Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") reference token ever made saved REDCapSync name. example, REDCap project object token name project$token_name. future, may set token different way.
code: #Install usethis if you don't have it. #install.packages("usethis")  usethis::edit_r_environ() # Now save your token.... (without the comment symbol '#') # REDCapSync_TEST = "faKeTokeN" # Save the file and Close # Restart R Session (session tab) # .rs.restartR() # this will also restart R session for you. Sys.getenv("REDCapSync_TEST") # now should contain your token

title: Tokens
text: ever issues token, can test project object view_project_token(project) /test_project_token(project)

title: The Project Cache
text: Using hoadr package, R finds standard location R typically stores cahced package data. example, Mac location might look like, “/Users/yourmacname/Library/Caches/R/REDCapSync”. exact path can found cache_path() time writing article, thing REDCapSync stores cache projects data.frame, can loaded projects <- get_projects().

title: Authors and Citation
text: Rose B (2025). REDCapSync: Synchronize Data Pipelines REDCap API. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/thecodingdocs/REDCapSync.
code: @Manual{,   title = {REDCapSync: Synchronize Data Pipelines from the REDCap API},   author = {Brandon Rose},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/thecodingdocs/REDCapSync}, }

title: REDCapSync
text: Several R packages exist using REDCap Application Program Interface (API) , REDCapR, redcapAPI, tidyREDCap. However, “get-everything--REDCap” R package can produce standardized R6 object REDCap project. REDCapSync streamlines comprehensive extraction. sync performed REDCapSync uses REDCap log update data changed since last API call. final project-agnostic object facilitates pipelining deidenification, deriving additional variables, linked excel sheets, exploratory data analysis RosyREDCap.

title: REDCapSync
text: Using cache previous saves, file directory, REDCap log, {REDCapSync} updates data changed since last API call. project becomes standardized R6 object can used best R offer via statistics, visualization, shiny apps, ! REDCapSync unleashes full power REDCap API even basic R user. aims REDCapSync … Encapsulate REDCap API one R6 object streamline use. Automate common tasks cleaning, deidentification merges. Automate distrubution user-defined Excel datasets local/cloud storage one many REDCap projects. Convert uncoded REDCap data R Excel upload using REDCap API. Power companion shiny app RosyREDCap leveraging combined strengths R REDCap, users can maintain strong data pipelines include statistics, visuals, even shiny applications!

title: REDCapSync
text: can install development version REDCapSync GitHub using pak package. Windows users may need install RTools version 4.5 use pak. issues, try downloading recent version R RStudio update packages RStudio. See thecodingdocs.com/r/getting-started.
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("thecodingdocs/REDCapSync") # or try remotes install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("thecodingdocs/REDCapSync")

what: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
title: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
text: Opens browser page given project object.

title: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
code: get_project_url(project, link_type = "home", open_browser = TRUE)  get_record_url(project, record, page, instance, open_browser = TRUE)

title: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
text: project validated project object containing REDCap project data settings. Generated using project <- load_project("PROJ") setup_project() link_type choose one "base", "home", "record_home", "records_dashboard", "api", "api_playground", "codebook", "user_rights", "setup", "logging", "designer", "dictionary", "data_quality", "identifiers" open_browser logical launching link internet browser record REDCap record id study id etc, column names match project$metadata$id_col page REDCap page record. Must one project$metadata$forms$form_name instance REDCap instance repeating instrument

title: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
text: internet link

title: Open Links to REDCap Pages — get_project_url
text: Uses utils::browseURL() open specified REDCap page. order function work must ran project <- sync_project(project) successfully least . link brings page work check URL. possible institution may changed redcap versions, part URL. case run project <- sync_project(project) . may signed REDCap work properly. doubt, just seek page navigating REDCap. Report issues can.

what: REDCapSync: Synchronize Data Pipelines from the REDCap API — REDCapSync-package
title: REDCapSync: Synchronize Data Pipelines from the REDCap API — REDCapSync-package
text: Provides tools download, organize, synchronize data REDCap projects REDCap application programming interface (API). package constructs reproducible project object stores data, metadata, logs, configuration details user-defined directory. supports incremental updates checking REDCap log retrieving modified data. Full updates triggered major metadata changes. User can define subsets, derived fields, transformations, stored list object passed output objects used data pipelines downstream applications, R shiny app RosyREDCap.

title: REDCapSync: Synchronize Data Pipelines from the REDCap API — REDCapSync-package
text: Maintainer: Brandon Rose thecodingdocs@gmail.com (ORCID) contributors: Natalie Goulett [contributor] Chris Hilsinger-Pate [contributor] Nikola Susic [contributor] Mason Thornton [contributor] Sydney Stern (ORCID) [contributor]

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — REDCapSync_project
text: summarize Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, summarizes data directory. save_to_dir Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, saves updated data directory. Default TRUE. hard_check check REDCap even due (see sync_frequency parameter setup_project()) hard_reset Logical. TRUE, overwrite existing summary files name. Default FALSE.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — REDCapSync_project
code: REDCapSync_project$add_summary(   summary_name,   transformation_type = "default",   merge_form_name = "merged",   filter_field = NULL,   filter_choices = NULL,   filter_list = NULL,   filter_strict = TRUE,   field_names = NULL,   form_names = NULL,   exclude_identifiers = TRUE,   exclude_free_text = FALSE,   date_handling = "none",   labelled = TRUE,   clean = TRUE,   drop_blanks = FALSE,   drop_missing_codes = FALSE,   drop_others = NULL,   include_metadata = TRUE,   include_records = TRUE,   include_users = TRUE,   include_log = FALSE,   annotate_from_log = TRUE,   with_links = TRUE,   separate = FALSE,   use_csv = FALSE,   dir_other = NULL,   file_name = NULL,   hard_reset = FALSE )

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — REDCapSync_project
text: summary_name Character. name summary generate summary. *provide summary_name parameters inherited according set add_project_summary. transformation_type Character vector. Default "default". Also "none", "flat", "merge_non_repeating" "default" first merges non-repeating repeating forms merges non-repeating variables right repeating instruments "flat" one-record, one-row, even repeating forms "none" transform anything "merge_non_repeating" still merges non-repeating instruments merge repeating instruments merge_form_name character string representing name merged form. Default "merged". filter_field Character. name field database filter . filter_choices Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_list Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_strict Logical. TRUE, forms filtered criteria. FALSE, convert original filter id column filter forms record. Default TRUE. field_names Character vector. Names specific fields include summary. Default NULL, includes fields. form_names Character vector. Names forms include summary. Default NULL, includes forms. exclude_identifiers Logical. Whether exlude identifiers data summary. Default TRUE. exclude_free_text Logical excluding free text. Default FALSE. date_handling character string. One none,exclude_dates, random_shift_by_record, random_shift_by_project, zero_by_record, zero_by_project random shift +/- 90 unless changed options labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. clean Logical. TRUE, data cleaned summarizing. Default TRUE. missing codes present number date type, R convert NA make variable upload compatible drop_blanks Logical. TRUE, records blank fields dropped. Default TRUE. drop_missing_codes Logical. TRUE, convert missing codes NA. Default FALSE. drop_others Character vector values dropped. include_metadata Logical. TRUE, metadata included summary. Default TRUE. include_records Logical. TRUE, record summary included generated summary. Default TRUE. include_users Logical. TRUE, user-related information included summary. Default TRUE. include_log Logical. TRUE, log changes included summary. Default TRUE. annotate_from_log Logical. TRUE, metadata, users, records annotated using log. Default TRUE. with_links Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) including links Excel sheets. Default FALSE. separate Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) separating form separate files opposed multi-tab Excel. Default FALSE. use_csv Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses CSV files data storage. Default FALSE dir_other Character. directory summary file saved. Default output folder within database directory. file_name Character. base name file summary saved. Default <project$project_name>_<summary_name>. hard_reset Logical. TRUE, overwrite existing summary files name. Default FALSE.

text: field_name Character. name field transformation applied. form_name Character. name form containing field. field_type Character. type field REDCap (e.g., "text", "checkbox", "dropdown"). field_type_R Character. corresponding R data type field. Default NA. field_label Character. label field. Default NA. select_choices_or_calculations Character. string specifying choices (dropdown, radio, checkbox fields) calculations (calculated fields). Default NA. field_note Character. optional note comment field. Default NA. identifier Character. string indicating whether field identifier (e.g., "Y" yes). Default empty string (""). units Character. units measurement field, applicable. Default NA. data_func Function NA. optional function transform validate data field. Default NA.

code: add_project_summary(   project,   summary_name,   transformation_type = "default",   merge_form_name = "merged",   filter_field = NULL,   filter_choices = NULL,   filter_list = NULL,   filter_strict = TRUE,   field_names = NULL,   form_names = NULL,   exclude_identifiers = TRUE,   exclude_free_text = FALSE,   date_handling = "none",   labelled = TRUE,   clean = TRUE,   drop_blanks = FALSE,   drop_missing_codes = FALSE,   drop_others = NULL,   include_metadata = TRUE,   include_records = TRUE,   include_users = TRUE,   include_log = FALSE,   annotate_from_log = TRUE,   with_links = TRUE,   separate = FALSE,   use_csv = FALSE,   dir_other = NULL,   file_name = NULL,   hard_reset = FALSE )

title: Add a Subset to a REDCap Database — add_project_summary
text: project validated project object containing REDCap project data settings. Generated using load_project setup_project summary_name Character. name summary create. transformation_type Character vector. Default "default". Also "none", "flat", "merge_non_repeating" "default" first merges non-repeating repeating forms merges non-repeating variables right repeating instruments "flat" one-record, one-row, even repeating forms "none" transform anything "merge_non_repeating" still merges non-repeating instruments merge repeating instruments merge_form_name character string representing name merged form. Default "merged". filter_field Character. name field database filter . filter_choices Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_list Vector. values filter_field used define summary. filter_strict Logical. TRUE, forms filtered criteria. FALSE, convert original filter id column filter forms record. Default TRUE. field_names Character vector. Names specific fields include summary. Default NULL, includes fields. form_names Character vector. Names forms include summary. Default NULL, includes forms. exclude_identifiers Logical. Whether exlude identifiers data summary. Default TRUE. exclude_free_text Logical excluding free text. Default FALSE. date_handling character string. One none,exclude_dates, random_shift_by_record, random_shift_by_project, zero_by_record, zero_by_project random shift +/- 90 unless changed options labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. clean Logical. TRUE, data cleaned summarizing. Default TRUE. missing codes present number date type, R convert NA make variable upload compatible drop_blanks Logical. TRUE, records blank fields dropped. Default TRUE. drop_missing_codes Logical. TRUE, convert missing codes NA. Default FALSE. drop_others Character vector values dropped. include_metadata Logical. TRUE, metadata included summary. Default TRUE. include_records Logical. TRUE, record summary included generated summary. Default TRUE. include_users Logical. TRUE, user-related information included summary. Default TRUE. include_log Logical. TRUE, log changes included summary. Default TRUE. annotate_from_log Logical. TRUE, metadata, users, records annotated using log. Default TRUE. with_links Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) including links Excel sheets. Default FALSE. separate Optional logical (TRUE/FALSE) separating form separate files opposed multi-tab Excel. Default FALSE. dir_other Character. directory summary file saved. Default output folder within database directory. file_name Character. base name file summary saved. Default <project$project_name>_<summary_name>. hard_reset Logical. TRUE, overwrite existing summary files name. Default FALSE.

what: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: Setup Load project object pipeline.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
code: setup_project(   project_name,   dir_path,   redcap_uri,   token_name = paste0("REDCapSync_", project_name),   sync_frequency = "daily",   labelled = TRUE,   hard_reset = FALSE,   records = NULL,   fields = NULL,   forms = NULL,   events = NULL,   filter_logic = NULL,   get_type = "identified",   metadata_only = FALSE,   batch_size_download = 2000,   batch_size_upload = 500,   entire_log = FALSE,   days_of_log = 10,   get_files = FALSE,   get_file_repository = FALSE,   original_file_names = FALSE,   add_default_fields = FALSE,   add_default_transformation = FALSE,   add_default_summaries = TRUE )  load_project(project_name)  load_test_project(project_name = "TEST_CLASSIC", with_data = FALSE)

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: project_name character string spaces symbols representing unique short name REDCap project. dir_path Optional character string representing directory path want REDCap project data stored. missing, project object current R session. redcap_uri character string representing base URL REDCap server. token_name optional character string setting token name. Default REDCapSync_<project_name> sync_frequency Frequency sync. Options "always", "hourly", 'daily', 'weekly', "monthly","never". check triggered calling function, can automated packages. Default daily labelled Logical. TRUE, data converted labelled. Default TRUE. hard_reset Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, forces setup even project object already exists. Default FALSE. records array, element corresponds ID desired record.  Optional. fields array, element corresponds desired project field.  Optional. forms array, element corresponds desired project form.  Optional. events array, element corresponds desired project event.  Optional. filter_logic String logic text (e.g., [gender] = 'male') filtering data returned API method, API return records (record-events, longitudinal project) logic evaluates TRUE.   blank/empty string returns records. get_type optional character REDCap API call type. data user ran sync_project. Default FALSE. metadata_only Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, updates metadata. Default FALSE. batch_size_download Integer. Number records process batch. Default 2000. batch_size_upload Integer. Number records process batch. Default 500. entire_log Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves entire log. Default FALSE. days_of_log Integer. Number days checked log hard_reset new project setup. Default 10. get_files Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves files REDCap. Default FALSE. get_file_repository Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, retrieves file repository REDCap. Default FALSE. original_file_names Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, uses original file names retrieved files. Default FALSE. add_default_fields Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default fields add_default_transformation Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default transformation add_default_summaries Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, add default summaries with_data Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, loads test project object data included.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: REDCapSync project list object.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
text: function sets project object storing REDCap API token configurations required interacting REDCap server. ensures token valid ready use subsequent API calls. Neither function directly attempts communication REDCap. setup_project used first time initialize/link REDCap project. Mainly, sets unique project_name intended directory. Unless run hard_reset = TRUE default first try load_project. dir_path technically optional without user save/load/update projects. load_project can used just project_name parameter already run setup_project past established directory. dir_path optional function can used relocated directory.

title: Setup or Load REDCapSync Project — setup_project
code: if (FALSE) { # Initialize the project object with the REDCap API token and URL project <- setup_project(   project_name = "TEST",   dir_path = "path/to/secure/file/storage",   redcap_uri = "https://redcap.yourinstitution.edu/api/" ) project <- load_project("TEST") }

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync
text: Syncs REDCap via project object user defined setup_project

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync
code: sync(   project_names = NULL,   summarize = TRUE,   hard_check = FALSE,   hard_reset = FALSE )

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync
text: project_names character vector project project_names previously setup. NULL, get get_projects() summarize Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, summarizes data directory. hard_check check REDCap even due (see sync_frequency parameter setup_project()) hard_reset Logical forces fresh update TRUE. Default FALSE.

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync
text: invisible return last project

title: Synchronize REDCap Data — sync
text: Syncs projects default can used hands-free sync one defined set projects. intended return project object. User use load_project("project_name"). However, default invisibly return last project set project_names.

title: REDCapSync 0.0.9
text: separated RosyREDCap shiny app Presented R Medicine conference 2024 Presented R Medicine conference 2025 Recently changed redcap_base param redcap_uri match REDCapR limit confusion
